attributes.action: remove unnecessary additives from packaged food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Food should be as nature intended - pure and natural. 

Ideas for improvement:

Every store should have a larger fresh section - extending the deli and bakery counters that already exist - to incorporate unnecessarily preserved food. 

Additives/colours/flavourings/preservatives in food should be more clearly marked on the packaging - with a link to a Government site explaining them and their dangers.

conscience against chemicals. keep food pure.
